title: Digital Support & Transaction Status

sections.title: Contacting Digital Support
sections.content:
Modern banks use apps and bots for fast help.

- **Help Center**: A website with common questions.
- **Chatbot / Virtual Assistant**: An AI that answers your questions.
- **Live Chat**: Chatting with a real person.
- **Ticket / Case**: A record of your support request.
- **Call support**: To speak on the phone.

sections.title: Transaction Status
sections.content:
Check the status of your payments in the app:

- **Pending**: The money is waiting (not finished).
- **Completed / Successful**: The transaction is finished.
- **Failed / Declined**: The payment did not work.
- **Refunded**: The money is sent back to you.

sections.title: Chatbot Flow
sections.content:
```mermaid
graph TD
    A[User: I need help] --> B{Chatbot: What is the issue?}
    B --> C[Payment Status]
    B --> D[Blocked Card]
    C --> E[Check App History]
    D --> F[Connect to Human Agent]
```
